Label: CT 107: USD-EUR Cross-Currency Swap starting at 01/02/2015
Description: USD-EUR Cross-Currency Swap starting at 01/02/2015 with Maturity after 2 years. The USD leg is of Notional 1000.0 and pays "reference rate A" on a quarterly basis in USD. The EUR leg is of Notional 815.0 and pays "reference rate B" + 2% on a quarterly basis in EUR.
